name: object-bound
description: Object.prototype.bound - Bind functions to objects with pleasure.

scripts.test: ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma-function.conf.js --single-run && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma-property.conf.js --single-run && ./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start karma-proxy.conf.js --single-run && ./node_modules/.bin/lcov-result-merger 'coverage/*.lcov.info' 'coverage/index.lcov.info'

author: Vladislav Zarakovsky <vlad.zar@gmail.com>
